Name: Lee Sin
AbilityDescription:
If there is a nearby ally. Lee Sin dashes towards them, shielding both them and himself for 4 seconds. If there are no nearby allies. Lee Sin gains more health shield instead. Afterwards, he dashes back and deals physical damage to his target.

Shield Amount : 180 / 220 / 270

Percent Of Attack Damage : 250% / 250% / 275%
